events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the process.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background and understand your suitability for the software engineering position.
Thank you for your prompt and detailed responses during the initial screening; it helped clarify your technical expertise.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 10 AM UTC with our senior engineering team.
The technical interview was completed successfully, and our engineers were impressed with your problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled for April 25th to discuss company culture, benefits, and your expectations.
The HR interview concluded positively with a mutual understanding of your role and our companyâ€™s values.
We have extended a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits package.
The candidate has reviewed the offer and provided positive feedback, expressing enthusiasm about joining the team.
The candidate formally accepted the offer, confirming their commitment to start working with us soon.
Onboarding process has been initiated, including setup of accounts, access rights, and orientation scheduling.
The hiring case is now officially closed with the successful onboarding of the new software engineer.
